para.text: Within 180 days after the effective date of this act, the Mayor shall allow individuals and entities to apply online for a permit to use school facilities.
For the purposes of this section, the term "school facilities" means fields, playgrounds, gymnasiums, multipurpose rooms, and other areas under the control of the District of Columbia Public Schools.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 6112 of Fiscal Year 2019 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-434, July 30, 2018, 65 DCR 8200).
